item.title: Flag and Emblem (2/2): Saint George and the Eagle
item.description: Eagle East versus West or symbol of national schizophrenia, itâ€™s not about that. The two-headed eagle (also seen in Albania, Serbia, and Montenegro) was used in the Byzantine Empire (and even earlier) and expresses unity rather than contradiction or division.
